skill-phase.name: Skill Phase
skill-phase.description: Foundation skills training with hands-on projects
features: Core skill-building through structured modules
Hands-on projects to apply learned concepts
Peer reviews and mentor feedback on projects

practice-basic.name: Practice Phase - Basic
features: Access to basic-level practice projects
Group mentorship sessions
Project reviews and feedback

practice-pro.name: Practice Phase - Pro
practice-pro.description: Advanced practice projects with industry mentorship
features: Advanced projects aligned with industry standards
1-on-1 sessions with industry mentors
Code reviews and optimization suggestions

practice-elite.name: Practice Phase - Elite
features: Exclusive elite-level project access
Personalized 1-on-1 weekly mentorship
Career-aligned feedback and project guidance

progress-basic.name: Progress Phase - Basic
features: Guided job search strategies
Resume and profile building support
Weekly progress tracking and check-ins

progress-pro.name: Progress Phase - Pro
progress-pro.description: Advanced career progression with pro support
features: Dedicated career coach support
Customized job application strategies
Networking and referral guidance

progress-elite.name: Progress Phase - Elite
progress-elite.description: Elite career progression with premium support
features: Premium 1-on-1 career mentorship
Interview coaching and mock sessions
End-to-end job offer negotiation support

career-guidance.name: Career Guidance
features: One-on-one career counseling session
Customized career roadmap based on goals
Industry-specific growth advice

interview-prep.name: Interview Preparation
features: Mock technical and behavioral interviews
Personalized interview performance feedback
Tips and techniques to improve confidence

resume-review.name: Resume Review
features: In-depth review by hiring professionals
Suggestions for structure, language, and keywords
ATS-friendly formatting and optimization

freelancer-basic.name: Freelancer Basic Package
freelancer-basic.description: Essential freelancing tools and basic templates
features: Access to essential freelancing tools for day-to-day operations
Basic contract and invoice templates
Starter guide for client communication and project setup

freelancer-pro.name: Freelancer Pro Package
freelancer-pro.description: Advanced freelancing tools, premium templates, client management pro, marketing resources
features: Advanced freelancing tools including time tracking and proposal builder
Premium templates for contracts, proposals, and invoices
Client management tools and access to marketing resources

freelancer-elite.name: Freelancer Elite Package
freelancer-elite.description: Complete freelancing suite with advanced tools and premium support
features: Complete suite including all Pro tools plus financial tracking and CRM integration
Priority support and access to legal & business experts
Exclusive access to advanced growth tools and freelancing community

payroll-epf.name: Payroll + EPF Services
payroll-epf.description: Complete payroll management, EPF compliance, tax calculations, automated payments
features: Automated payroll processing for accurate and timely employee payments
EPF (Employees' Provident Fund) compliance and contributions management
Monthly tax calculation and TDS deductions with payment automation

tax-filing.name: Tax Filing Support
tax-filing.description: Professional tax filing assistance and compliance support
features: End-to-end support for income tax return (ITR) filing
Review and optimization of deductions and exemptions
Assistance with tax notices, queries, and compliance updates

legal-support.name: Legal Support
legal-support.description: Contract templates, legal consultation, and compliance guidance
features: Access to standard legal contract templates (NDA, service agreements, etc.)
One-on-one legal consultation for business matters
Guidance on compliance, risk mitigation, and intellectual property protection

business-setup.name: Business Setup Assistance
business-setup.description: Company registration, GST setup, and business compliance support
features: Company or sole proprietorship registration (GST, PAN, etc.)
Assistance with obtaining business licenses and permits
Compliance checklist and documentation setup for new businesses
